Testing the Magit Git Client in Doom Emacs (OLD POST)

This is bascially just a quick test of uploading to my website using just Doom Emacs, from editing the site in Org-Mode, converting it to HTML, and uploading it to GitLab using Magit, if you want to know more about Magit, please check out this video.
